chunk_text:
/**
 * ServiceContainer.js
 * Implements a simple dependency injection container for managing game services.
 * Provides centralized access to game managers, systems, and shared resources.
 *
 * @class ServiceContainer
 * @description
 * A dependency injection container that:
 * - Stores game services and managers
 * - Provides type-safe access to services
 * - Manages service lifecycle and dependencies
 * - Supports singleton and transient services
 * - Enforces strict type checking on service keys
 *
 * @example
 * // Register a service
 * container.register('audio', new AudioManager());
 * 
 * // Retrieve a service
 * const audio = container.get('audio');
 */

export class ServiceContainer {

metadata.notes: Class definition with enhanced documentation for DI container
Method to register a service in the container with runtime type checking
Method to retrieve a service from the container with runtime type checking

chunk_text:
/**
 * Global singleton instance used throughout the game
 * 
 * @description
 * A shared container instance that:
 * - Provides global access to game services
 * - Maintains singleton service instances
 * - Ensures consistent service access across scenes
 * - Enforces type safety on all operations
 * 
 * @example
 * // In any file:
 * import { container } from './ServiceContainer';
 * const audio = container.get('audio');
 * 
 * @type {ServiceContainer}
 */
export const container = new ServiceContainer();
